PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04642010-04-01,  ,  PWGSC,  TB,  ,  , 
ActFederal Real Property and Federal Immovables Act
Subjecthypothec agreement with 6979611 Canada Inc. 3340848 Canada Inc.
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Public Works and Government Services (a) to enter into an hypothec agreement with : (i) 6979611 Canada Inc. in respect of the immovable located at 22 Eddy Street, Gatineau, Quebec, with all the buildings, circumstances and dependencies that are or may be erected on it, in order to secure 6979611 Canada Inc.'s obligations related to the option to purchase allowing Her Majesty in right of Canada to acquire the immovable for one dollar ($1.00) upon expiration of the lease, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in the governing lease; and (ii) 3340848 Canada Inc. in respect of the immovable located at 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau Quebec, with all the buildings, circumstances and dependencies that are or may be erected on it, in order to secure 3340848 Canada Inc.'s obligations related to the option to purchase allowing Her Majesty in right of Canada to acquire the immovable for one dollar ($1.00) upon expiration of the lease, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out in the governing lease; and (b) to execute any act deemed necessary or useful to the release or discharge, in whole or in part, of the hypothec agreements and all accessory rights.
AttachmentsAttachment
